title: Game crashes every time. Even after reinstalling
body: My game crashes everytime, and when it crashes it attempts to repair the client. I've re installed the game 3 times now. i don't know what to do. also my client freezes every 20 seconds. when i close the client, an updated client opens and that one freezes in 20 seconds aswell.

replies.body: It's hard to tell if this issue is with your game files, drivers, or maybe even a combination.  I suggest going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide and following through each step to rule out any possibilities.  You can use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to perform a clean reinstall just in case any old game file is being missed during your update.  Let me know how that works for you.
